metadata.name: NFT DOVE  #1
metadata.description:
Most of us feel great concern about all the war, hate, and fear raging around us.  Ehsan has created a brand to inspire global peace, giving half to charities. When you collect you become part of this Vision; simultaneously, you are investing in a rare noble cause asset class.

This iconic dove, Ehsan's signature symbol, is Vision of Unity and Peace distilled into a single image. Set in black, white and gray with 2000 colors cast behind. This series spans every color shade, each hue a path toward peace.  

For more info visit:
https://www.VisionsbyEhsan.com
